nodes.bodyText: Do we need ensure_docker now that we will be running this on circle-ci outside of docker ?

We need docker because this line runs the liquibase build: 
  
    
      workbench/api/db-cdr/generate-cdr/generate-private-cdr-counts.sh
    
    
         Line 38
      in
      5527c89
    
    
    
    

        
          
           if ./generate-cdr/init-new-cdr-db.sh --drop-if-exists --cdr-db-name $WORKBENCH_DATASET
How does your build create the database and tables?
I missed this. Running liquibase is part of import script in databrowser which is different step from building cdr indices.
